name: Prime Blazers: The Communist Mariofesto
description: Communism! The best way of life we could have, right? Yet the flawed ways of democracy and capitalism has controlled most countries for years. Now is the time for the holy motherland to stand. As Mario's Russian lookalike you shall invade the USA and topple down capitalism in an epic platformer to spread the good of communism and save the world! Now go Forward Comrade, Not One Step Back!
